snippet.title: F1® Manager 2022 | Gameplay Trailer | Launching From August 25
snippet.description:
Pre-Order F1® Manager 2022 digitally for a 10% discount and five days early access, to play from August 25*!  https://bit.ly/3M3WY95

We are delighted to announce that F1® Manager 2022, the official management game of the FIA FORMULA ONE WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP™, will be playable from August 25th!  

Our latest trailer offers a closer look at the authentic, detailed, dramatic world of F1® that you’ll be entering, as a Team Principal for one of the 10 official teams.

Pre-order F1® Manager 2022 right now on Steam, Epic Games Store, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One. Pre-ordering from our store pages ensures you not only receive a 10% discount, but can also play five days early, beginning on August 25th, ahead of the game’s official launch on August 30th.

*Check out https://www.f1manager.com for full details on early access and 10% discount. 

Find out more:
Twitter – https://twitter.com/F1manager
Instagram - @F1manager
Facebook – https://facebook.com/f1managergame
Twitch - https://www.twitch.tv/f1manager 

#F1 #F1Manager
